duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform a variety of instrumentation and automation services, troubleshooting, calibration, installation, testing, and commissioning.
Troubleshoot instrumentation functionality and I/O operation.
Repair instrumentation, typically involving calibration using a variety of meters and tools.
Set up new instrumentation and calibrate to specifications using schematics and drawings.
Perform preventive and corrective maintenance of test apparatus and peripheral equipment.
Assist with a variety of related installation and maintenance projects for automating large industrial processes.
Use computerized equipment and software to perform testing functions and produce reports.
Work with engineers testing and commissioning PLC systems.
Travel to customer sites to provide services as required.
